breach_report.root_cause_analysis: Recent redemptions increased cash position above policy limit
breach_report.remediation_suggestion: Reduce cash by 2% (~$2.4M) - Deploy into existing equity positions aligned with current allocations

breach_report.root_cause_analysis: Issuer downgrade last month from BBB- to BB+, position now below minimum rating threshold
breach_report.remediation_suggestion: Divest BB+ rated holding (~$5.1M) - Replace with investment grade bonds (BBB- or higher) in similar duration

ambiguity_flags.ambiguity_note: Please verify: Does 'investment grade' include BBB- or only BBB and above? Document language is unclear on exact threshold.
